example[0]: He was questioned by police twice yesterday.
example[1]: None of our dinner menus are exactly the same twice over.
example[2]: Letters were delivered twice a week only.
definition[1]: two times more, bigger, better etc than something else
example[3]: They employ 90 people, twice as many as last year.
example[4]: Interest rates are twice as high as those of our competitors.
example[5]: an area twice the size of Britain
